If you're looking for a new smartwatch, but the Apple Watch Series 9 is a little over your budget, then CMF, a new brand by the company behind the Nothing Phone 2, has you covered.

articles.title: Eufy's new dual-lens security cameras can use AI to stitch together video recordings - ZDNet
articles.description: The new cameras use AI to track movement across multiple devices and compose a full sequence of events.
articles.content:
Eufy Security
